comments:
Created an attachment (id=76636)
Fixing the issue when opening a report out of workspace

BIRT 2.2 can't open reports that are located out of a workspace.

You can use the following steps to reproduce the issue:

- create a new report and save it out of workspace
- try to open the report using File>Open File...

You will get the following exception:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.editors.MultiPageReportEditor.addPages(MultiPageReportEditor.java:222)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.editor.FormEditor.createPages(FormEditor.java:146)

	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.editors.ReportEditorProxy.createPartControl(ReportEditorProxy.java:121)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorReference.createPartHelper(EditorReference.java:661)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorReference.getEditor(EditorReference.java:263)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WWinPluginAction.runWithEvent(WWinPluginAction.java:229)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection(ActionContributionItem.java:545)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$2(ActionContributionItem.java:490)

Attached is a patch against BIRT_2_2_0_Branch that solves this issue.
Thanks for the patch. This has already been fixed in 2.2.1 branch.
